name: Hollywood Paradise
description:
Stop! In the name of Hollywood! Start your career as a movie producer with the #1 movie making simulation game on Google Play today.

Welcome to the star studded, stunning and spectacular bays of Hollywood Paradise! As head of your own movie studio, you call the shots. Hire directors, script writers, actors, actresses, film editors and build your studio into an Oscar winning powerhouse. Shoot awesome blockbuster films and become a true Hollywood icon now!

Game Features:
- Choose from 18+ genres to make your film unique
- Build your own entourage and shoot amazing movies
- See your movies live in cinemas all around the world
